duties_responsibilities.duty: Install, repair, and maintain electrical wiring, conduit, equipment, and fixtures.
Read blueprints and specifications to determine the scope of work and identify all tools required for tasks.
Identify safety risks, precautions required to eliminate those risks, and set up and maintain temporary power systems.
Assemble and install electrical equipment, terminate wires and cable to electrical equipment, and inspect electrical equipment and components to ensure operational conditions.
Install and maintain grounding systems for all equipment and structures, and hoist equipment and tools into a location via bull rigging or crane.

education_certification.credential: Electrical Apprentice License at a minimum and a state Journeyman Electrician License.
